nodes.text: The nameplate by the door says that this is Katie and Esme's room.
I can't find a keyhole, yet Katie and Esme's door is shut tight. I have no idea how these doors work.
What is it?
I just wanted to talk...
Don't even start!
Go avay, you fatty√∫!
What is it?
I just wanted to remind you that I love you.
Okay, that's pretty sweet. Love you, too.
I just wanted to tell Esme that I love her...
Esme, it's your sweetie...
I love you, too, Shawn. I vill see you tomorrow, no?
Tomorrow, yes. Sweet dreams!
Good night to you, too.
Will you dream of me?
I hope so!
Good night to both of you! Now!
Katie! We need to talk about your map...
Sorry, Shawn, Katie is not here now. She is very mad at you.
Oh, just tell her I got her map back, okay?
She vill be pleased to know that. Thanks.

nodes.message: Cycle of Katie and Esme being annoyed.

nodes.text: Who is it?
Hi, it's me. I just wanted to talk a bit.
Talk sometime else, Shawn. Go away.
Vhat is it?
I just wanted to say good-night to you both.
Good night, Shawn.
Night!
What is it?
Would you two like to do something?
Yeah, go to sleep!
They're both probably sleeping.
I don't think anyone's in the room right now.
It's sealed shut. I can't budge it.
Either my ears are plugged, nobody is talking, or I'm a lousy listener...
I can't hear anything now.
They're both probably sleeping.
I don't think anyone's in the room right now.
Now vhat vill you do? Are you leaving?
I don't know yet. It's so hard to believe that I really got the treasure.
I'll stay through the semester here at the school. When my father gets back to port in a month, I'll talk to him about it.
Do you think he vill respect now you have treasure?
No, Poppa will probably still treat me like a child. I'll have to be the adult.
Vill that vork for you?
<sigh> I'll know when I try it. The hardest part will be holding my temper with him.
That will be harder than finding the treasure, no?
So vat do you think of the new kid in class? He is kind of cute, no?
O'Conner looks like someone who just walked off the streets of Caligari with no money and no future.
We'll see how long he lasts here. Otherwise, he's just another loser.
Maybe you prefer Sosi, then?
Caesari is charming, cultured, and wealthy. If you're hunting for a boyfriend, there are worse places to look for one.
You are not looking for boyfriend?
I've got better things to do with my life than moon over some Prince Charming in hopes that he'll give me a "Happily Ever After."
Me? I'm going to make my own future.
That fatty√∫! That stupid, bloody, pig of a man! How dare he treat me like I vas curvƒÉ!
He's a man... what did you expect?
You vere the one who said he vas charming!
I also said that I wouldn't trust a man with my future. All men are lying, cheating, scurvy dogs...
Even your father?

My father lied to me and my mother about his 'merchant' ship. He was a pirate captain! After Mama died, I begged to become part of his crew. All he did was pat me on my shoulder and tell me I needed to find a good husband.
That's why I'm here. I'm going to find the treasure of the 'Royal Flush', buy my own ship, and be my own captain.
Then my father will see that a woman doesn't need a man to set sail on her own course.
So who do you think is behind the thefts at the school?
I am not sure, but I do not think it is student. It is something else.
Something else... you mean like some sort of monster or a Drat?
Monster, no. I vould know if it vas a Drat. But it seems to be everyvere. I vill see if I can track it down.
Okay, so what is behind the Dangerous Door in the Wine Cellar?
Is Proach! Is huge, giant Proach. Is bigger than horse.
Ugh. Proaches are nasty big bugs to begin with... but a Giant Proach? No way I'd go near that door.
Giant Proach is very bad thing. There is bad magic on it - powerful magic. Magic that grows stronger... makes Proach stronger. It must be stopped or magic vill be too great.
Look - it's not our problem. Leave it for the Paladins of this school to be the heroes and stop the Giant Proach. We're the ones who avoid trouble, remember?
Maybe so... but Proach vill be much tougher if not stopped soon.

nodes.name: Eavesdropping Info
nodes.description: So Esme says there's a Giant Proach in the Wine Cellar behind the Dangerous Door. Interesting. Katie thinks it's a little tooo dangerous...

nodes.text: How did you find the vay down to Sea Caves?
I knew that there was a concealed passageway. That's how my father and the others escaped from the Sea Caves so many years ago - through this castle.
It's why I signed up for the school - to get into the castle and then find the entrance to the Sea Caves.
I still vant to know how you found passageway.
I knew that Kyro had to be sneaking out of the school at night to get things for his black market, so I followed him the other night.
He led me to the secret door in the Hall of Heroes. There's a hidden hallway behind the secret door with another concealed door that has stairs going down to the Sea Caves.
Katie, it is dangerous down there...
I can handle myself.
I've looked everywhere! It didn't just drop out of my backpack.
Vhere did you find it vas missing?
In the Hall of Heroes - I was going down to the Sea Caves. I had stopped in front of the secret door to study the map, and it was gone. I searched my entire backpack. There's no sign of it.
Everyone listened ven you talked in the Rec Room. Maybe Sosi...
I don't go near Sosi. Besides, he'd never get his hands dirty. He'd get his worm to do it. So the thief is either Kyro or Shawn.
Shawn vould not do that! He is good person.
It is Sosi - one vay or another.
I'll find my map... And whoever took it will be in big trouble.

nodes.message: Eavesdropping event only happens if Katie hasn't found the treasure yet. If Shawn doesn't help her, she'll find the treasure by Day 28.

nodes.text: Any luck while you vere down there?
I've found some of the places marked on the map. I'd have gotten further if the Gogs hadn't attacked.
You vere lucky you did not get killed. As it is, you vill be sore for weeks. You need to heal.
What I need is to find that treasure soon. I'm sure that Sosi made a copy of the map and he's looking for it. I won't let him steal my treasure.
If you vant more help, I can...
Don't worry, I can handle this. I need to handle this. I need to earn this treasure for myself.
Vy would you vant to go to Catacombs?
Both Kyro and Thomas are sneaking there. I'd like to find out why.
You could just ask them.
Where's the fun in that?
You definitely think that Kyro is lost in the Catacombs?
His trail led me to the sealed grate, but I cannot go in the Catacombs. There is too much death there. Rovers attract the Undead.
So what difference can a few ghosts make?
It is not ghosts I fear, but the Wraiths and Revenants. Those, too, crawl the halls. It is a bad time of year to disturb such a place.
Oh, right. It's almost the Nights of the Dead.
<shudder> The Dead call to us. They are restless now.
Poor Kyro. He's probably dead.
Better he is dead than Undead.
Uggh.
I've never seen this many ghosts. We always stayed in our inn on the Nights of the Dead and set aside a table with offerings for the couple of ghosts who appeared every year.
It is worse than I have ever seen. So many Ghosts!
The Dead, they are scared.
Ghosts can be scared? Of what?
Even they do not know vhat they fear. They only know something is coming.
The Ghosts are afraid of something coming? That's bad, right?
Yes. Very bad.
Drats. If they could see themselves in the mirror, they'd die of disgust.
There are vorse things than Drats.
Does this have something to do with why the Ghosts were so upset on the Nights of the Dead?
No. Ghosts need not fear Drats. This is something different.
These Drats are Varrior Drats. They are not hunting for food.
Then what are they hunting for?
I do not know yet. I just know it is important to find out.
I can't hear anything now.
